comment.author: 30625132@N03
comment._content: I know remember who Otto Hess is from watching the ESPN Classic channel. He won the 1914 World Series with the team now known as Boston Red Socks.

comment.author: 28251797@N03
comment._content: Very cool photo, love the high socks and old metal spikes. But actually, Hess was not a Red Sox, he was a member of the Boston National League team (the Braves), now based in Atlanta. www.baseball-reference.com/h/hessot01.shtml

comment.author: 28251797@N03
comment._content: Au contraire!  The American League came into existence in 1901;  Hess played for its Cleveland franchise from 1902-08.
